question: (Mike and Mike in the ESPN studio deliver the clue)"The most amazing Olympic event ever?  It's the U.S. hockey team's "Miracle on Ice" in 1980.""Well, that was a good one, but what about this man's 4-gold-medal-winning performance in Berlin in 1936 that gave Hitler fits"
